org.openrdf.sail.nativerdf

Class NativeStoreExt

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openrdf.sail.helpers.SailBase
      • org.openrdf.sail.helpers.NotifyingSailBase
        • org.openrdf.sail.nativerdf.NativeStore
          • org.openrdf.sail.nativerdf.NativeStoreExt
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.openrdf.sail.NotifyingSail, org.openrdf.sail.Sail

    public class NativeStoreExt
extends org.openrdf.sail.nativerdf.NativeStore
    Native Store extension which introduces a hook with a specialized connection (cf NativeStoreConnectionExt), which allows for efficient evaluation of prepared queries without prior optimization.

    Whenever a native store is to be used as a repository within FedX, use this extension.

    Author:
    Andreas Schwarte
    See Also:
    NativeStoreConnectionExt
